    • getComparatorMap

      protected Map<String,​Comparator<Resource>> getComparatorMap()
      Description copied from class: EntityService
      Get comparators map for entity type. Comparators map is a (key, value) map, where:
      • key is the name of a property belonging to the given entity type
      • value is a comparator class, under the comparators subpackage
        • , that compares according to that property
      Specified by:
      getComparatorMap in class EntityService<Resource>
      Returns:
      comparators map

    • getFilterMap

      protected Map<String,​Filter<Resource,​?>> getFilterMap()
      Description copied from class: EntityService
      Get filters map for entity type. Filters map is a (key, value) map, where:
      • key is the name of a property belonging to the given entity type
      • value is a filter class, under the filters subpackage
        • , that filters according to that property
      Specified by:
      getFilterMap in class EntityService<Resource>
      Returns:
      filters map

    • get

      public Resource get​(User u, ResourcePermission.Type min, String code)
      Gets single resource by its code only if a given user is authorized to read
      Parameters:
      u - the given user
      min - lowest permission needed to access resource
      code - resource's code
      Returns:
      resource object, if it exists
      Throws:
      NoSuchElementException - if resource doesn't exist or user is not authorized to read it

    • update

      public Resource update​(User u, String code, Resource data)
      Updates resource only if a given user has write-permission to it
      Parameters:
      u - given user
      code - resource's code
      data - new resource data
      Returns:
      updated resource, if no errors occur
      Throws:
      NoSuchElementException - if resource doesn't exist or user hasn't got write permissions on it

    • addFile

      public ResourceFile addFile​(Resource r, org.springframework.web.multipart.MultipartFile mpf) throws IOException
      Adds a file to a given resource and save it in filesystem Default upload directory is the one in application.properties file
      Parameters:
      r - given resource
      mpf - file content
      Returns:
      saved ResourceFile object, if no errors occur
      Throws:
      NoSuchElementException - if resource doesn't exist
      IOException - if file saving gets into error

    • deleteFile

      public void deleteFile​(Resource r, String fileCode) throws IOException
      Deletes file from resource
      Parameters:
      r - given resource
      fileCode - given file's code
      Throws:
      NoSuchElementException - if resource or file don't exist
      IOException - if file deletion goes into error

    • setPermissions

      public Set<ResourcePermission> setPermissions​(Resource r, Set<ResourcePermission> data)
      Sets permissions to resource Deletes all previously stored permissions and readd them from zero
      Parameters:
      r - given resource
      data - permission set
      Returns:
      updated resource, if it exists
      Throws:
      NoSuchElementException - if resource doesn't exist
